resp = client.search(
    index="sales",
    size="0",
    query={
        "constant_score": {
            "filter": {
                "range": {
                    "price": {
                        "lte": "500"
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    },
    aggs={
        "prices": {
            "histogram": {
                "field": "price",
                "interval": 50,
                "hard_bounds": {
                    "min": 100,
                    "max": 200
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
